The shuttle finally landed inside the Ark landing bay, the is a slight
jostling at the last moment as the shuttle actually touched down, but
not enough to cause any undue discomfort.

"Alright!" POLAR CLAW said from the front seat. "Let's unload and get
the wounded to the medbay!"

POLAR CLAW's voice was all authority and command as he stepped out of
the cockpit area and into the section where NIGHTSHIFT and the rest
were seated, and it was immediately obvious that POLAR CLAW himself
was in need of medical care or a CR chamber or both. Long gashed went
down his frame, followed by burnt marks and places where he had been
sliced.

However he didn't seem to even feel it as he looked at WOLFGANG,
NIGHTSHIFT and RAMULUS, "Wolfgang, get inside and lets get this ship
repaired, on the double. Ramulus, you get Nightshift to the medical
bay."

"The same could be said for you." PROWL said as he too exited the
cockpit section of the ship. He also had taken a few slashes and
burns, but not nearly to the extent that POLAR CLAW had.

POLAR CLAW grunted, "Later. First we have a mission to complete."

---------------------------------

Meanwhile OUTSIDE the shuttle on the ARk bay floor, TORCA and the
other fuzors, along with RAT TRAP and STRAIGHT shot had watched the
shuttle come in and could see the landing gear crumple as the ship
touched down and the ship rumble to a stop.

"Judging by the ship they are probrably going to need some help."
SANTON said as he looked on.

WINGCALIBER nodded as he watched the shuttle ramp extended and the
door opened, the sound of orders being given coming from inside, it
sounded like POLAR CLAW.

(TAG)

Preston
